alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 12:53AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fulton County through 130 AM CDT... At 1253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Viola, or 8 miles west of Salem in Fulton County, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem in Fulton County... Mammoth Spring... Viola... Sturkie... Mammoth Spring State Park... Flint Springs... Moko... Fryatt... Saddler Falls... Camp... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
